title: Masterclass on English Writing Paraphrasing Strategies Using Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Teaching competency enhancement course for pre-service or in-service teachers, utilizing real-time video lectures and mobile-friendly tools in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can restructure sentences while preserving the core meaning of the original text by utilizing various online paraphrasing tools.
Learners can apply paraphrasing strategies (lexical substitution, sentence structure modification, semantic combination) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can write five or more paragraphs of original expressions without plagiarism in project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
